lines.text: Is this place taken?
[he sits down]
Madame, would you mind if I smoked?
I noticed you took a pill. I thought perhaps...
[he waves his packet of cigars at her]
huh? Nothing. Small headache.
Are you sure the smoke won't distress you?
I'm never distressed by smoke. Surely not. But thank you.
Not at all. I have a headache myself. I wonder if it would be too much to ask if, eh...
The aspirin?
[she gives him the pills]

[knocking her bag off the table]
Oh, I am sorry
Don't worry. It's not important
Very clumsy of me. I'm terribly sorry. Would you allow mw to buy you a drink?
No thank you. Alcohol doesn't agree with me.
Are you travelling alone?
Alone? Oh, no. I always have Toutou
[picking up her poodle]
Dit "bonsoir", Toutou
Bonsoir, Toutou. You're a fine looking fella.
He loves being flattered.
He seems to understand every word you say.
Oh, yes. Toutou and I always have conversation. Toutou is most understanding.
All my life I've wanted to meet a truly understanding dog. Perhaps we could write to each other. Where does Toutou live?
In my mind.
Then I'll write to Toutou, care of the mind of Madame, er...
No. Because I also live in the mind of another...
Who's mind is that?
[she leaves without replying]
